CoinTracker | Engineer #1 | San Francisco, CA | Full-time | ONSITE

CoinTracker is a portfolio & tax manager for cryptocurrency. We are on a mission to make cryptocurrency more accessible.

Some Facts About CoinTracker:

  * Tracking over $200M in crypto assets across 30,000 connected exchange accounts
  * Ramen-profitable
  * Funded by YC, Initialized Capital (Coinbaseâ€™s first seed investor), Juan Benet (Filecoin), and other great angels
  * https://techcrunch.com/2018/04/10/cointracker-raises-1-5m
